snippet: Coming off a tough season, linebacker Bart Scott likes the athleticism of the Jets’ defensive line, the physicality of the new safeties and the confidence of quarterback Mark Sanchez.
abstract: New York Jets linebacker Bart Scott, whose tackle total fell to 66 last year, from 81 the season before and 92 the season before that, is looking for a comeback year.
lead_paragraph: Coming off a tough season, linebacker Bart Scott likes the athleticism of the Jets’ defensive line, the physicality of the new safeties and the confidence of quarterback Mark Sanchez.

headline.seo: Jets’ Bart Scott Remains Mad Backer Coming Off Tough Year
headline.main: Though Tone Is Familiar, Scott Has His Eye on a Different Result
headline.print_headline: A Jets Veteran Hopes to Regroup
